programme.title: My Cat from Hell

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr Jeff makes a surprising discovery when he examines a beloved Weimaraner that has stopped eating. A servicewoman brings in a pit bull with an injured leg

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: A year after losing their house in a fire, M2 and Kanani do something special for the dog that saved their lives. A parolee returns after a mysterious absence

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: A woman who loves adopting older dogs is ready for another. Mariah and Kanani are searching for a box of puppies left to fend for themselves

programme.title: Insane Pools: Deeper Dive

programme.title: Treehouse Masters

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?

programme.title: Top of the Pops

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Simon Bates introduces performances by Raw Silk, Blue Zoo, Culture Club, Dionne Warwick, Melba Moore, Tears for Fears and Eddy Grant. Plus, video footage of the Beatles. Originally broadcast on October 28

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Tony Blackburn presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 28 October 1976. Featuring Alan Price, Chicago, Leo Sayer, Joan Armatrading, Simon May, Pussycat and a Legs and Co dance routine

programme.title: Bruce Springsteen at the BBC
programme.desc: A selection of performances from the BBCs archives by the American singer-songwriter. Featuring a look at his early days, appearances on The Old Grey Whistle Test and Top of the Pops, as well as his glory days in the 1980s

programme.title: When Bruce Springsteen Came to Britain
programme.desc: A look at the American singer-songwriters unique relationship with the UK, telling the story of his first European gig, when he and his E Street Band arrived for a sold-out performance at Londons Hammersmith Odeon in November 1975 to promote his Born to Run album. In an interview recorded for this programme, Springsteen reveals how he was so disappointed by his own performance that night that he couldnt watch the footage back for more than 30 years, while fans recount how hearing - and meeting - Springsteen changed their lives

programme.title: Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band: Hammersmith Odeon 1975
programme.desc: The singer-songwriter and his bands first European concert, featuring performances of Thunder Road, Shes the One, Born to Run, Rosalita (Come Out Tonight) and Quarter to Three. First broadcast 19 May 2006

programme.title: Top of the Pops

programme.title: The Flying Gardener
programme.desc: Chris Beardshaw travels to both Devon and Cornwall to discover how plants survive in the most exposed areas of Britain and he transforms a local residents balcony using miniatures and bonsai

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: James gets caught in a feud between Oliver and Roland Strong, who have not spoken to each other for 50 years. Rural drama, starring Christopher Timothy and Robert Hardy

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: A confectioners beloved cat falls victim to a mystery illness that defies all Jamess attempts to find a cure. Rural drama, with Robert Hardy, Christopher Timothy and Geoffrey Bayldon

programme.title: Ian McNeice Remembers - Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Actor Ian McNeice reminisces on his time as agent Harcourt in the BBC 1985 political crime thriller Edge of Darkness

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Policeman Ronald Craven is in the midst of investigating a union election scandal when his daughter Emma is shot and killed in front of him at their home. Learning of her involvement in an ecological group and absolutely determined to trace her killer, Craven goes to London to investigate. First part of Troy Kennedy Martins 1985 political thriller, starring Bob Peck in a Bafta-winning role, with Joanne Whalley, Joe Don Baker and Ian McNeice

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Emmas killer is trapped - but Craven is unable to discover the reason for her death before hes shot, and a meeting with CIA agent Darius Jedburgh convinces the grieving father there are deeper conspiracies to be uncovered. Troy Kennedy Martins nuclear thriller, with Bob Peck and Joanne Whalley

programme.title: Parkinson
programme.sub-title: Spike Milligan, James Coburn and Professor Eric Laithwaite
programme.desc: Michael Parkinson in conversation with Spike Milligan, James Coburn and Professor Eric Laithwaite

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Margo is horrified by the prospect of dressing in saucy clothes for her music societys production of Sweet Charity, and Tom discovers oil in his garden. Classic comedy, starring Richard Briers and Penelope Keith

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Hacker attempts to gain support for his tax cuts - by threatening to raise the duty on tobacco. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: James gets caught in a feud between Oliver and Roland Strong, who have not spoken to each other for 50 years. Rural drama, starring Christopher Timothy and Robert Hardy

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small

programme.title: A Slow Odyssey
programme.sub-title: A Slow Odyssey: A Turtles Journey
programme.desc: An immersive journey into the world of a green sea turtle, using only natural sounds and embedded graphics to deliver detailed information about its daily routine

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Caught
programme.desc: An incident in which police were staggered by a thief with many disguises who went on to confess far more than they could imagine. Plus, how the net closed in on a gang stealing sentimental jewellery

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion Dublin heads to the seaside town of Mablethorpe in Lincolnshire to see a detached two-bed bungalow thats seen better days. Hes also in Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, to see a two-bed semi-detached house bought by two property developing brothers. Just outside Norwich, Jacqui Joseph visits a characterful, Grade II listed cottage.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Couple Ellie and Josie take their expert Irita Marriott on a dash around the stalls to find three profitable items to sell at auction. A vintage enamel sign goes straight on the backburner before they spot an Indian brass model of ox pulling a cart. Meanwhile, antiques specialist John Cameron and couple Pav and Melissa kick off with an old football and rugby ball before deciding that a deal on a Danish bonbon dish just isnt sweet enough for them. While the two teams compete, Natasha Raskin Sharp asks passers-by about an intriguing tool. Its made of two metals, has rotating blades and fits in the palm of the hand

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Hope Street
programme.desc: When an under-prepared Clint collapses during a half-marathon, Port Devines newest police officer - hunky ex-rugby player Donal - carries him over the finish line. Clint needs a doctor, so glamorous GP Sasha hurries over to assist - and the attraction between herself and Donal is instant. However, as the pair help Clint towards Sashas car, the vehicle explodes. It falls to Inspector Eve Dunlop and her team to determine who did it - and why. Tara Lynne ONeill stars in the police drama set in a fictional Northern Irish town

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A health-conscious couple from London enlist Sonali Shah to help them spend £1.3 million on a detached property in Surrey with enough land to create a wellness retreat. Taking a breather from house-hunting, Sonali immerses herself in the countys ancient woodlands as she learns about the Japanese practice of forest bathing

programme.title: The Repair Shop on the Road
programme.sub-title: Dumfries and Galloway - A Book for Lockerbie
programme.desc: Will Kirk and Kirsten Ramsay are in Dumfries and Galloway, where they help with a project to commemorate the victims of the Lockerbie bombing. Will is also joined by new automata expert Michael to tackle a clockwork train that was once the pride and joy of its owners father and Kirsten learns the secrets of medieval slipware pottery from a pair of experts in the nearby village of Corsack

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret amount, which could be anything from zero to £4,000, before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong and Phil Wang co-host the quiz in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: JB Gill and Clara Amfo host the live magazine show featuring a mixture of celebrity chat and stories of interest

programme.title: North Coast Riders
programme.desc: Ethan Hill and Albert have spent the winter tracking a mythical wave - one that only breaks under rare conditions. With the charts finally aligned, they head out in pursuit. Ricky Bell, once one of Irelands boldest climbers, returns to the rock with a challenge hes long held in mind. After years of balancing fatherhood and work, hes ready to test himself again. Meanwhile, Hanno Windisch prepares for a scouting dive. With tourist season still months away, he explores new underwater sites that could sustain his work and passion

programme.title: Return to Paradise
programme.desc: A scientist working at a shark research lab is found dead on a runaway boat. Detective Mackenzie Clarke - aka Mack - suspects the death is a meticulously planned murder. The return of the Death in Paradise spin-off, starring Anna Samson and Lloyd Griffith

programme.title: Leonard and Hungry Paul
programme.desc: Leonard gets positive feedback on his new childrens book proposal. Encouraged, he asks Shelley to go on another date, which doesnt go to plan. Meanwhile, Hungry Paul attends an unusual job interview, hoping to become the new spokesperson for the National Mime Association. Comedy, narrated by Julia Roberts and starring Alex Lawther and Laurie Kynaston

programme.title: Leonard and Hungry Paul
programme.desc: Leonard learns the fate of his book proposal and of his future with Shelley. On the eve of her wedding, Grace feels held back by her responsibility towards her younger brother. Leonard and Hungry Paul attend her wedding as each others plus ones and start a new venture to reintroduce people to silence. Comedy, narrated by Julia Roberts and starring Alex Lawther and Laurie Kynaston

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Have I Got News for You
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts, as Labour MP Louise Haigh and comedian Laura Smyth join in the fun on the satirical current affairs quiz alongside regular team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton. As usual, all concerned poke fun at the weeks headlines

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The host is joined by double Oscar nominee Keira Knightley, now turned childrens author with I Love You Just the Same. Plus, female education activist Malala Yousafzai talks about her new memoir Finding My Way, Aimee Lou Wood reflects on her role in BBC comedy series Daddy Issues and comedian Chris McCausland recounts his journey from comic to Strictly winner in Keep Laughing.Theres music from Mumford and Sons with Hozier, who perform their new single Rubber Band Man

programme.title: How Are You? Its Alan (Partridge)
programme.desc: Newly single and never happier, Alan throws himself into new experiences to see if trying fresh things can improve peoples wellbeing - and finds joy in the unexpected. Comedy, starring Steve Coogan, with Felicity Montagu and Tim Key

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The pressure is on as the queens singing, dancing and acting skills are challenged in Peter Pansy - The Rusical. West End musical theatre legend Mazz Murray joins head judge RuPaul, alongside Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel. Later, the curtain comes down on yet another queen

programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Live
programme.desc: Matt Tebbutt is joined by chefs John Chantarasak, Thomasina Miers and Daisy Terry, and by special guests Bryan Cranston and Marianne Jean-Baptiste. Drinks expert Helen McGinn pairs the wines with the studio dishes

programme.title: Mary at 90: A Lifetime of Cooking
programme.desc: Mary Berry takes a fond look back at her career in food, while cooking some of her favourite dishes with friends both old and new. To begin with, she is joined by comedian Tom Allen. Together, they take a boat ride and cook dishes, including Marys classic pan-fried cod, her mothers bread and butter pudding and a Thai chicken traybake

programme.title: Football Focus
programme.desc: Alex Scott and guests look ahead to the weekends matches, including Tottenham Hotspur v Chelsea, Burnley v Arsenal and Liverpool v Aston Villa

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Eric Knowles presents the show from Epsom in Surrey, and ails one of Londons hackney cabs to take him across the capital. Thomas Forrester and Gary Pe assist the teams

programme.title: Live International Rugby League
programme.desc: England v Australia (Kick-off 2.30pm). Coverage of the second fixture in the three-match Ashes series, which takes place at Hill Dickinson Stadium in Liverpool. This is the first time this stadium has hosted a rugby league contest and both teams will be eager to make an impact ahead of next weekends concluding game in Leeds

programme.title: Final Score
programme.desc: Jason Mohammad presents a round-up of the results and this afternoons news from the Premier League, EFL and Scotland

programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: The Celebrity Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show, with Chizzy Akudolu, JJ Chalmers, Charlie Hedges, Susie McCabe, Melvin Odoom and Hasan Semay paired with six contestants. Each pair is randomly assigned a secret stash of cash, before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve and strategic gameplay

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman present this years Halloween special, which sees the couples performing lots of tricks and treats to wow the judges and win viewers votes. Frightening foursome Shirley Ballas, Craig Revel Horwood, Motsi Mabuse and Anton Du Beke will give their usual critiques before scoring the dancers efforts before the public vote opens

programme.title: Michael McIntyres The Wheel
programme.desc: The comedian hosts the game show in which contestants answer questions with the aid of celebrity experts - aware that one wrong answer means someone else gets a chance. This weeks specialist knowledge comes from Josh Widdicombe, Chris Harris, Colin Jackson, Harriet Kelmsley, Shirley Ballas, Frankie Bridge, and Jordan North and William Hanson in the double chair

programme.title: Nine Bodies in a Mexican Morgue
programme.desc: An explosive finale reveals the secrets of flight CBZ51 and the identity of the killer. Mystery, starring Eric McCormack

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest forecast

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Liverpool v Aston Villa at Anfield and Tottenham Hotspur v Chelsea at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. Champions Liverpool claimed a 2-0 home win over the Villans last term, while the Blues claimed a memorable 4-3 victory over Spurs in the corresponding fixture 11 months ago. Plus, Brighton and Hove Albion v Leeds United, Burnley v Arsenal, Crystal Palace v Brentford, Fulham v Wolverhampton Wanderers and Nottingham Forest v Manchester United

programme.title: The Football Interview
programme.desc: Kelly Somers talks to Everton and England goalkeeper Jordan Pickford

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: Unexpected allegiances form. Quiet gets to work, John makes amends, and Sweet Tooth is ready for revenge

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: John and Quiet face a difficult choice as everything comes to a head and new players enter the fray

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Death, of Stupid Deaths fame, presents his very own show crammed full of spooky highlights. Featuring Sarah Hadland, Steve Punt and Meera Syal

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: In 1967, an orphaned boy goes to live with his grandmother, only to find himself the prey of diabolical witches disguised as glamorous women. Heading to a seaside hotel seems like a great way to escape, but in an unfortunate twist of fate, the worlds Grand High Witch is gathering her coven at the same resort, and has a nefarious plan in store. Co-writer/director Robert Zemeckiss take on the beloved Roald Dahl fantasy, starring Anne Hathaway, Octavia Spencer and Stanley Tucci, and narrated by Chris Rock

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Finglas and everyone is getting into the spooky spirit of things. Agnes is ready for any trick-or-treaters, but instead receives a surprising visitor from her past. As no one else can see her ghostly guest, they think shes gone mad - not even Doctor Flynn can help. Luckily, Father Damien is on hand, and with a little help from Grandad, they get rid of the unwanted guest in time to head down to Foleys for the fancy dress shindig. A special of the comedy recorded live in 2021, written by and starring Brendan OCarroll

programme.title: Inside No 9
programme.desc: The 25th episode of Steve Pemberton and Reece Shearsmiths anthology series is a Halloween special performed and broadcast live in 2018. A man finds an old mobile phone in a graveyard and decides to try and return it to its owner. But no good deed goes unpunished, and his investigation into the mystery leads him into a nightmare of his own making. With Stephanie Cole

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: Three survivors of the original Woodsboro massacre reunite when a killer dons the infamous ghost mask and strikes during the production of a movie based on their experiences. As they try to determine the identity of the murderer, Sidney discovers a troubling link to her past, forcing her to confront her demons once and for all. Horror sequel, starring Neve Campbell, David Arquette and Courteney Cox

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Sian Eleri recounts the story of Helen Duncan, who claimed she could summon the dead. Helen was a Scottish medium, who in 1944 went on trail at the Old Bailey and became the last person convicted and imprisoned under the Witchcraft Act. Sian visits Helens birthplace, Callander, a small town where her childhood premonitions caused fear in the community

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Disturbed by a recording of what appears to be a spirit voice and accounts of the late medium Helen Duncan summoning physical spirit forms, Sian Eleri focuses on evidence from those who believe this apparent seance to be fake. Searching for answers and hoping to understand how Helen was convincing people they were communicating with their dead loved ones, Sian tracks down a modern-day medium. He claims to commune with the other side, but a seance in Edinburgh leaves Sian with more questions than she first started with

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Sian finds a medium in the Netherlands who claims they bring back spirits in physical form. This could be a glimpse into Helens world, but Sians been warned there are dangers. Back in the UK, Sian reads an astonishing account of Helen bringing back a Second World War sailor from the dead in Portsmouth

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Sian discovers an account of a spirit revealing secret information during a seance. This new evidence could prove Helens abilities - or that she was a spy. Either way, it seems the authorities wanted her out of the way because she was seen as a danger

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mobeen Azhars investigation into prison corruption uncovers the murder of a former officer who had been involved in exposing an illicit relationship. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestone
programme.desc: Sian Eleris investigation into the reported haunting of Penyffordd Farm continues as multiple witnesses claim to see a hooded figure. Could they all have imagined the same thing? As she listens to recordings the original investigator made, Sian discovers the Welsh words for disabled and child had allegedly appeared on the walls. Sian meets with one of the Gower daughters to ask whether at the time she believed that to be the monk apparition focusing in one family member

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestone
programme.desc: Unable to meet Rose-Mary or David, Sian Eleri visits an exorcist to find out what he believes removing a spirit from the house would entail. She speaks to the daughters of the couple that owned the house at the height of the haunting to question them one last time and Dr Daniels finds a similar case in Spain that might provide a clue as to how the haunting might have been a hoax

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: It is Halloween in Bikini Bottom, and the Flying Dutchman is going to make sure everyone is scared - even SpongeBob

programme.title: Doctor Who Confidential
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the press tour that launched the series, which saw stars Matt Smith and Karen Gillan travel from Belfast to London, visiting their home towns of Northampton and Inverness en route. Designers also offer an insight into the creation of the underground city featured in the episode Cold Blood

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Doctor tries to persuade mankind and the reptilian Silurians to live in peace and share the Earth. However, the leader of the reptiles military is determined to wage war, while some of the humans plot a desperate reprisal of their own. Meera Syal, Neve McIntosh and Robert Pugh guest star alongside Matt Smith, Karen Gillan and Arthur Darvill

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: The newlyweds return from their honeymoon to a big welcome from both their families. However, Smithy seems disconcerted by his pals return and Nessa makes a confession that spoils the happy occasion. Comedy, starring Mathew Horne, James Corden and Joanna Page

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Smithy goes missing following Nessas shocking revelation, and the boys try to track him down to persuade him to accept his responsibilities. Meanwhile, Stacey is forced to contemplate the consequences of transforming her long-distance relationship with Gavin into a functioning marriage

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma receives dodgy life advice from her incarcerated sister Catherine and Rita, her alcoholic boss. Worried that she will be having the baby alone, she enlists Cherry to help her find a suitable, ideally rich, father for her unborn child. Meanwhile, Malcolm thinks he has found love with a woman online. Gemma educates him on the perils of catfishing - but Derek encourages Malcolm to meet her. Comedy, starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey and Taj Atwal

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma attends birthing classes led by a very eccentric antenatal teacher. Realising she needs more support, she seeks advice from her aunt Jess, Malcolms sister. Malcolm and Gemma are invited to Jess and her domineering husband Tyrones new house for a party. Malcolm is scared of Tyrone, who intimidates him with his new hot tub. Comedy, starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey and Taj Atwal

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The pressure is on as the queens singing, dancing and acting skills are challenged in Peter Pansy - The Rusical. West End musical theatre legend Mazz Murray joins head judge RuPaul, alongside Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel. Later, the curtain comes down on yet another queen

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: The ultimate hunt for the best new British comic begins as 30 hopefuls battle it out across six heats to earn a place at the Final, where one will be crowned the BBC New Comedian of 2025. Josh Jones hosts the West heat at St Georges, a multi-purpose, fully accessible live music and arts venue in the heart of Bristol. Carwyn Blayney, Will Owen, Omari Douglas, Jess Carrivick and Alfie Dundas take to the stage in a bid to impress judges Priya Hall, Harriet Dyer and Fatiha El-Ghorri

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Sarah Keyworth hosts, as second heat contenders Eli Hart, Farhan Solo, Chloe Reynolds, Will BF and Monica Hsueh take to the stage of Birminghams Hockley Social Club in a bid to book their place in the final. Head judge Fatiha El-Ghorri is joined in her ranks by comedian, writer and podcaster Aurie Styla and local Brum stand-up Lindsey Santoro

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Alexandra Palace in north London, venue of the BBCs first ever television broadcast, stages the south of England heat, as comics Blank Peng, Fab Goualin, Sharifa Butterfly, Sydney May and Evaldas Karosas battle it out to book their place in this years grand final showdown. Host Sara Pascoe is joined by stand-up comics Catherine Bohart and Michael Odewale, who appear alongside Fatiha El-Ghorri on the panel of judges

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: In Italy, Mike and Jools start work to upgrade the ancient infrastructure of their medieval settlement, while Lucie and Jerry begin a salvaging mission as their villages properties begin to fall down. And in France, Patrick and Mihaela prepare to put their newly renovated holiday rental to the test before re-opening the gates to their rural estate

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Payment day finds the BandBers trying to get their heads around all manner of things, from facilities faults to shoddy sleep scores. After a tension-filled visit last time around, there are plenty of scores to be settled, but whoever will reign supreme when the payments are revealed is anything but certain

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The final night in Belfast sees amateur pilot James try to impress his guests with a Mexican-inspired menu that he has planned to a tee. The visitors find a photo of James wedding reception that leaves Kirsty speechless. Andrea is thrilled at the chance to feed her host, but for Aodhan its all about the food. Will James be on cloud nine by securing win the £1,000 prize or will he be left on the runway?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Married couple Angela and Andy love the Spanish culture, cuisine and lifestyle so much that they want a holiday home on the Costa Dorada, to visit whenever they want. With a stunning stretch of coastline, this golden coast lives up to its name with its glistening beaches and turquoise waters and also boasts a rich history, Roman architecture and fabulous traditional towns. Leah Charles-King shows the pair five options for their maximum budget of £190,000. After an underwhelming start confirms what they dont want, a floral treat on the eyes tickles their fancy

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Unreported World
programme.sub-title: Guns and Cocaine: Colombias Narco Wars
programme.desc: After a 2016 peace deal following a 50-year civil war, Colombia has once again become engulfed in violence, as guerrilla groups battle for control of coca fields and lucrative smuggling routes. In the past year alone, more than 50,000 people have been forced from their homes and civilians face the daily threat of killings, forced recruitment and displacement. Guillermo Galdos travels deep into the Catatumbo region to understand the fight for cocaine production and gains rare access to Colombias special forces as they launch operations against guerrilla fighters

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Guests Joe Wilkinson, Cherish Finden and Katherine Ryan join Jo Brand and Tom Allen to review the events of patisserie week. Plus, a look at viewers home baking pictures and a chat with the latest baker to leave the tent.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the weeks biggest and best shows

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by celebrity guests for a comic review of the significant moments of the past seven days. As usual, the hashtag #isitok paves the way for the gang to round up, examine and explain the leading and most entertaining news stories of the week

programme.title: Sarah Millican: Chatterbox Live
programme.desc: Stand-up show recorded at Londons Bloomsbury Theatre in 2011, in which the comedienne shares humorous insights into her life, including the perils of living alone, and offers advice on such topics as non-fattening stress relief, the alternative to marriage and the acceptable face of adultery

programme.title: Shiva Baby
programme.desc: Frivolous college student Danielle expects to face the usual uncomfortable conversations with guests when she attends the traditional Jewish mourning observation of a family friend. programme.title: Crawl

The pair find themselves trapped in a rapidly flooding house, but the rising waters might be the least of their worries. Horror thriller, starring Kaya Scodelario and Barry Pepper

programme.title: Ramsays Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Southbridge, Massachusetts, where he checks into the Vienna Inn, an Austrian-themed hotels and restaurant. Owners Jonathan and Lisa Krach have seen their cluttered inn acquire a negative reputation among the locals, and as a result, business isnt what it used to be. Can Gordon turn things round and keep the doors to this historic hotel open?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Mobile hairdresser Verene Farrell hosts the first dinner party in Barnsley, South Yorkshire. She offers a main course of kangaroo fillet with a confit of quandong and yakajirri rosti, hoping to impress part-time drag queen Christian Whiteley-Mason, businessman and wine enthusiast Phil Davies, novelist Milly Johnson and Paul Hoyle, a man known to his friends as Party Paul

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Paul Hoyle hosts the second dinner in Barnsley, South Yorkshire, and plans to live up to his party-boy reputation by preparing three types of entertainment for his guests. However, the mood turns sour when it is revealed one of the diversions calls for them to bring their swimwear

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Part-time drag queen Christian Whiteley-Mason hosts the third dinner party in Barnsley, South Yorkshire. He decides to spend the evening as his alter ego Lady Bacardi and dress one of the male guests as a woman, but the entertainment is not to everybodys taste

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Novelist Milly Johnson hosts the penultimate dinner party in Barnsley, South Yorkshire, and hopes her hearts and flowers theme will bring harmony back to the group following the previous nights confrontation. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Wine and food snob Phil Davies host the final night in Barnsley, South Yorkshire, hoping to win the prize with an impressive menu prepared from scratch and a carefully selected wine to accompany each course. Unfortunately, his guests are not looking forward to the meal

programme.sub-title: The Spy Who Came in for a Cold One

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: A TV agent visits the bar and offers Sam a contract doing beer commercials - but soon makes it clear she doesnt want their relationship to be purely professional. Ted Danson stars

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Preoccupied with the ball game on TV, nobody pays much attention to Dianes sadness over the death of her family cat. It is left to Sam to discover the reason for Dianes grief. Meanwhile, Sam and Coach use insider information to make a bet

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Diane is aghast when Carla tricks the surprised but ecstatic Marshall Lipton into believing he is the father of her unborn child. Bar-room comedy, starring Rhea Perlman

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam supports his former baseball team-mate Tom when he comes out of the closet in his new autobiography, hosting the book promotion press event at the bar

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam and Diane challenge each other to find their perfect dates, but he ends up grabbing a highly unsuitable partner for her from the pool room who isnt quite what she had in mind. Comedy, starring Ted Danson and Shelley Long

programme.desc: Robert asks Ray and Debra to help with his criminal psychology course by taking IQ tests - but gives them misleading results to gauge their reactions

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Frank has some anecdotes published in a magazine, sowing the seeds of grand writing ambitions. He approaches Rays editor about becoming a columnist, but finds his way with words leaves a lot to be desired. Comedy, starring Peter Boyle

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Seattle shrink is delighted when a station in another city begins relaying his radio show - until he struggles to compete with the popularity of the host he has replaced. Elsewhere, Niles, Daphne and Martins attempt to build a table does not go according to plan

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphnes birthday party sparks a series of unexpected events, and after a night of intimacy, Frasier pursues Roz to her family reunion in Wisconsin, where he pretends to be her estranged partner Roger. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and Peri Gilpin

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles persuades Daphnes hard-drinking father to call on her mother in Seattle, hoping he can inspire them to start afresh. Meanwhile, Frasier and Roz reflect on their night together. Comedy, guest starring Brian Cox

programme.desc: A spoof of TV thriller Homeland in which Homer returns from a nuclear convention a changed man. programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The death of a popular Springfield man prompts four locals to address the biggest regrets of their lives so far. Homer still feels the sting of selling his Apple shares, wife Marge worries she may have been responsible for Barts bad-boy instincts and newsreader Kent Brockman reveals he chickened out of a career move. As for the fourth - it seems even Mr Burns liked someone

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The week kicks off at 38 St Giles in Norwich, where guests enjoy a historic afternoon at the citys cathedral, and breakfast is a roaring success for everyone but one

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Harry and Sarah hope to wow their guests with their recently renovated pub The Royal Oak in Hawkhurst, Kent. Unfortunately, the style doesnt match one BandBers standards. After an afternoon on the beers at a microbrewery, moods are high but some pernickety furniture feedback brings Harry and Sarah back down to earth with a bump

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandBers head to Tiddington in Oxfordshire for the weeks third visit, where Dawn hosts at her country pub, The Fox and Goat. The facilities seem to be flawless, leaving one guest determined to find some faulty furniture. Theres another historic afternoon out, this time with a tour around Blenheim Palace. All that walking should have the BandBers knackered and ready for bed - so why does one of them have such a restless night?

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit of the week is to No 64 at The Joiners in West Malling, Kent. Host Ollie hopes that his French-styled BandB will have that je-ne-sais-quoi to win the competition. The guests monkey around at a zoo in the afternoon before things get heated in the kitchen the next morning. The heat rises even further when Ollie sees his breakfast scores

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its payment day, and after an epic battle all week, the contenders meet up one final time to find out which boutique BandB has triumphed

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer visit Swansea to help Sarah and Caradog, who moved into their four-bedroom home shortly before their third child was born in 2008 and have been struggling for space ever since, with only one bathroom, a cramped kitchen and an office squeezed into the box room. Sarah is ready to list it. But Caradog is determined to love it and is convinced this home can work with Kirsties magic touch. He also loves the garage and thinks itll be hard to beat elsewhere. With a long list of problems to solve and a budget of £75,000, Kirstie has a tricky task on her hands. But will a refurbished family heirloom swing it in her favour? Meanwhile, Phil hits the streets with a search budget of £500,000, looking for three fabulous houses to make Caradog question his allegiance to Team Love It

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Alison Hammond and Noel Fielding present as the semi-finalists take on patisserie week, serving up cream horns and tackling a recipe for a sugar glass dome in the technical round. programme.title: Horse of the Year Show 2025
programme.desc: Matt Baker, Gemma Owen and para-dressage rider Tegan Vincent-Cooke present Coverage of the equestrian event, featuring behind-the-scenes stories from the UKs equine world. Featuring in-hand classes and high-stakes showjumping with riders and ponies from all over the country

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Bettany Hughes Treasures of the World
programme.desc: Bettany explores how communities have connected and thrived for millennia in Switzerland. She begins at the Jungfraujoch, stepping onto the Aletsch Glacier and meeting the custodians of its high-altitude research station. At the Great Saint Bernard Pass, she meets the priests of the hospice and explores their extraordinary archive. Alpine traditions are also examined, from William Tells legend to cheese-making in Gstaad. Finally, in the medieval heart of Bern, she climbs the cathedral and explores the 500-year-old Zytglogge clock

programme.title: Great British Train Journeys from Above
programme.desc: Hugh Bonneville narrates a journey through the rolling hills of Englands south-west on the West Somerset Railway created by Isambard Kingdom Brunel. Widely recognised as one of the greatest engineers of all time, Brunels remarkable railways and structures are known worldwide. This episode travels along his railway through the Quantock Hills to the Bristol Channel

programme.title: Honest Thief

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: A heroin addict makes a series of attempts to kick the habit, but the grind of everyday life and a circle of similarly self-destructive friends keep dragging him back to his old ways. Following a near-fatal overdose, he comes to the realisation that the only way to put his life in order is to rid himself of his friends - which is easier said than done. Danny Boyles drama based on Irvine Welshs novel, starring Ewan McGregor, Robert Carlyle and Ewen Bremner

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line

programme.title: Tommy Cooper: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: Performances by the comedian and magician and actor previously unseen by a British TV audience, including a guest appearance on The David Frost Show in New York in 1969, and his tour-de-force routine on an American TV special in 1967. The programme includes testimonies and memories from those who worked with or knew him, including actress Sheila Hancock, music producer Trevor Horn, broadcaster Janet Street-Porter, entertainer Jimmy Tarbuck and writer Colin Edmonds

programme.title: The Battle for Royal Lodge: Andrew vs The People
programme.desc: The story of one of the royal familys most luxurious homes, a 30-room mansion which is the current home of Prince Andrew - although King Charles is said to want him out. This film looks into the history of the house, which has long been at the centre of royal drama, as well as a beloved country retreat of the Queen Mother, where Elizabeth and Margaret enjoyed an idyllic childhood

programme.title: The Meghan Effect: How She Shook Up the Royal Family
programme.desc: One of the most divisive and controversial celebrities in the world, the Duchess of Sussex is seen by some as a champion of truth and by others as guilty of nearly bringing down the monarchy. This documentary examines how she has both revitalised and unsettled the royal family in ways that no one could have predicted

programme.title: 70s TV We Loved and Lost
programme.desc: Three modern families take a trip back in time to enjoy a night of prime-time TV from the 1970s, to discover what people watched, how they watched it and what it says about the different eras. Putting away their mobiles and picking up their cuppas, the families are treated to a range of 50-year-old programmes including sitcoms, game shows, drama and news, as well as a range of 1970s adverts giving a glimpse of newly emerging brands and how they spoke to peoples aspirations and daily lives

programme.title: Are You Being Served?: Secrets and Scandals
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of the sitcom, revealing how the shows creators had to fight the BBC throughout its run to keep it on air, how there was the off-screen jostling for top billing, and the personal tragedies that befell the cast. Featuring contributions from actor and comedian John Thomson, stars Mike Berry and Louise Burton, singer Jess Conrad (who appeared on the show), Mollie Sugdens son Robin Moore and original crew members Robin Carr and Roy Gould

programme.title: Rich House, Poor House
programme.desc: The return of the programme in which families from opposite ends of the wealth and class divide swap homes, budgets and lives for seven days. Millionaire barrister and property entrepreneur Roy Ledgister swaps homes with single mum Becky Biggington in a life-changing experience for both. Roy has a sprawling Kent estate, complete with tennis court, swimming pool and gym, while Becky lives just 40 minutes away in a two-bedroom Sussex council house with her two young sons

However, Bernadette is upset when Howard freaks out over her announcement as he becomes convinced that he needs to start earning more money. Comedy, Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the 200th episode of the comedy, the gang finally celebrates Sheldons birthday after more than nine years together, with the help of a few special guests. Starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with guest appearances from Adam West, Wil Wheaton and Stephen Hawking

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard face problems when they file for a patent for their infinite persistence gyroscope. Plus, Penny, Amy and Bernadette give Raj dating advice when Emily reaches out to him after their breakup. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy is shocked at a revelation from Sheldon after she buys him a new laptop, while Raj sells out Leonard and Howard after they lie to their wives in order to attend an early screening of a movie. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: On a weekend cabin trip with Penny and Amy, Sheldon spills one of Leonards secrets, while Howard and Bernadette must draw a line when Raj goes overboard with pregnancy gifts. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon disagree over whether to continue holding their regular Roommate Agreement meetings, with Leonard suggesting they are no longer required, while Sheldon believes they are still essential. As the pairs squabble quickly escalates into a full-blown argument, the rest of their friends turn up for a planned Game of Thrones viewing party, and end up taking sides in the dispute - resulting in two warring factions taking up residence in 4A and 4B. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang goes to a bar and runs into Pennys old boyfriend Zack, while Bernadette is left to spend the evening with Sheldon when she cannot go wine tasting with the others. Elsewhere, things do not go to plan when Raj introduces his new girlfriend, Claire. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon discovers a surprise screening of The Avengers is scheduled at a local cinema, complete with a QandA session with the films director, Joss Whedon. However, the event just happens to clash with time hed planned to spend with Amy, so he decides to pay Stuart to be his subtitute for the afternoon while he and the other boys immerse themselves in Marvel superheroics. Meanwhile, Leonards mother Beverly arrives in town for an extended visit, and Penny takes the opportunity to bond with her new mother-in-law - and to make up for not inviting her to the wedding. Comedy, guest starring Christine Baranski

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Conflict arises when Leonards newly divorced parents and Sheldons devoutly religious mother are all in town at the same time. And when Howard and Raj are contacted about the guidance system theyve developed, they assume that the government is out to get them. Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q head to Miami to play pranks on the beach, and they also zip around on scooters controlled by the others

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q teach fencing, pose as hairstylists, while the punished joker melts down during a presentation on climate change

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q host a team-building seminar and pose as caricature artists on a boardwalk. Plus, the loser faces a confused and unamused biker gang

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q hit the supermarket to confuse shoppers in an epic game of hide-and-sneak, and the guys draw straws at a barbecue joint

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay forces everyone to take a family holiday on a houseboat on a lake as he aims to create wonderful memories that will last long after hes gone. For the kids, life on the lake isnt quite as fun as they had hoped, while Mitchell runs into an old flame and Cam cant go in the sun. Phil and Claire try to make the most of their surroundings by trying out some rather adventurous excursions. Comedy, starring Ed ONeill

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire realise that Alex may be more self-sufficient than they give her credit for when they drop in for a quick visit to her college, while Manny is determined to avoid a long tearful goodbye after Gloria and Jay move him into his dorm. Mitch may have accidentally accelerated a planned renovation, and Hayley gets an unexpected opportunity when she befriends a wealthy female member at the country club

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos on the themes of food and animals

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.sub-title: Spanish Pavillion, Kingston Cafe, La Frite and Capri
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits four restaurants he earlier tried to save, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or fell by the wayside. First he visits the Spanish Pavillion in New Jersey, then heads to California to see the owners of Kingston Cafe, French-themed La Frite, and Capri

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part edition, Gordon Ramsay heads to La Galleria 33 in Boston, Massachusetts, an Italian restaurant run by sisters Rita and Lisa. The pair grew up working at their fathers eatery nearby, but when they opened their own business, they couldnt replicate his success, and they now blame their failure on everything from the weather to the tablecloths

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer gets Flanders a job as a human resources supervisor at the plant. However, he soon learns that no good deed goes unpunished when his neighbour starts to insist on carpools and demands more from his work performance. Matters reach a head when Flanders suggests Mr Burns donate to charities - instead of the other way around. Meanwhile, Marge feels as though their marriage has lost its spark

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: An insurance payout sends the Simpsons on a trip to Denmark, where they hope to get free healthcare for Grampa, who needs a serious operation

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy pulls out all the stops as she hosts a traditional Victorian Christmas Eve dinner for the friends. Meanwhile, Rajs father comes to visit, and the guys do their best to free a bird they accidentally let into the university clean room. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj endures an anxious day as he worries that a space probe he helped design will not function properly, while Leonard and Sheldon agree to go clothes shopping with Penny and Amy. Comedy, starring Kunal Nayyar, Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitch and Cam join the campaign to save an old tree in the park, while Jay and Manny are way out of their depth when they attend a childrens Olympics-themed birthday party. Claire takes Gloria shopping - only to have a run-in with the supermarket manager

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Manny and Lukes baseball team makes it into a play-off game, so Claire and Cameron scramble to find a suitable location and decide to make over a rundown field. Meanwhile, Gloria tries bonding with her unborn baby by singing to it - prompting an unexpected reaction from Jay

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon petitions Wil Wheaton to allow him to appear on the new Professor Proton show, so the actor offers a guest appearance to Amy instead. Meanwhile, Penny gets angry when she thinks the female protagonist in Leonards novel is based on her

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Bernadettes friends each try different tactics to help her go into labour. Howard isnt happy when he finds out that Bernadette has already chosen their sons name without his input

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: While Leonard jumps through hoops to help secure the perfect wedding venue for Sheldon and Amy, Howard and Bernadette have a difficult time deciding which one of them should stay at home with the kids and who should return to work

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny gets the opportunity to spend time with Bill Gates at work, because his business wants to partner with her pharmaceutical company. Leonard, Howard and Raj do everything in their power to also meet the high-tech entrepreneur, while Sheldon thinks hes the victim of an April Fools Day prank

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The squad members partner up for their next Halloween Heist - unaware they have to be handcuffed to each other. But that is just the start of their problems

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Holt asks for Jakes help in a case that is exceptionally meaningful to him. Charles and Terry work together on a side business

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Comic Book Guys origin story is revealed as he and his wife Kumiko debate having a baby

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart finds his old teachers diary and learns a surprising secret, while Lisa faces a dilemma when she discovers an even bigger eye-opener herself

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Pennys former boyfriend Zack and his wife encounter fertility problems when wanting a baby, so ask Leonard for his help. Raj attempts to patch things up with his estranged fiancee Anu

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy are thrilled when their super-asymmetry theory is proved correct by two physicists from Chicago - until the experts try to exclude Amy from their Nobel Prize nomination. Bernadette experiences a big success at work and plans for Penny to become a part of it - whether she wants to or not

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is excited to help Howard and Bernadette navigate some bureaucratic paperwork, until he discovers that they are breaking the law, leaving him with a difficult choice between following the rules or staying loyal to his friends. Leonard is disappointed when he is excluded from a scientific project his friends are working on

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny tries to put a stop to Leonards plan to be a sperm donor for her ex-boyfriend Zacks wife. Howard, Bernadette, Anu and Raj make the most of the latters cancelled stag party

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer accidentally declares himself bankrupt, while Bart and Lisa con a delivery man into giving them a large amount of cardboard boxes. Grampa leaves the Springfield Retirement Castle and ends up falling in love with Selma

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer becomes a member of the paparazzi, and proves so successful at snapping embarrassing photographs that his celebrity victims seek revenge on him for exposing their indiscretions

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Musk Who Fell to Earth
programme.desc: Billionaire entrepreneur and inventor Elon Musk enjoys a stay in Springfield, quickly striking up a friendship with Homer - who inspires the newcomer to dream up a new idea for the nuclear power plant. Mr Burns is keen to put the plan into action - but it would cost him a massive sum of money and plunge the town into depression

programme.title: Celebrity Come Dine with Me
programme.sub-title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine With Me
programme.desc: The final host, Charlie Wernham, throws an East End-themed night, on the set of Hollyoaks, and pushes the boat out with fresh seafood that has come all the way from Billingsgate Market in London

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart and his family enter the twilight zone in three more cartoon tales of horror, including the discovery of Barts demented twin in the attic and Lisa being the god to an alternative human species cultured in a margarine tub. Plus, Homer tries to expose two fraudulent presidential candidates

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In another horrific helping of grisly Halloween tales, Bart becomes a cyborg, Homer finds himself hunted in a macabre chase headed by Mr Burns, and a witch casts a spell on the residents of Springfield at a fancy-dress party

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Springfield is the setting for parodies of Mad Men, Michael Bays Transformers and Its the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown in this Halloween-themed episode. Homers vote on election day is misread by a renegade machine, Lisas Malibu Stacy car turns into a robot determined to start a war, and a giant pumpkin seeks revenge

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Another collection of spine-tingling Halloween tales from Springfields best-known family. Homer is paralysed by a venomous spider, Ned Flanders becomes a night-time vigilante, and Bart and Milhouse transform into one-eyed aliens

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Another trio of Halloween stories. Bart unlocks a portal to hell and attends a school where bad behaviour is actively encouraged - although goody-two-shoes Lisa has a tougher time fitting in. Homer stars in his own version of A Clockwork Orange, in which he tries to give up the thug lifestyle after falling for a certain blue-haired lady, and in the final story, the family are haunted by ghosts from the past

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Another trio of Halloween stories, featuring Maggie becoming possessed by an ancient demon, Lisa discovering a creepily perfect version of her family in an alternate universe and Homer cannibalising himself after he runs out of food while Marge and the kids are away from home

programme.title: A Quiet Place Part II
programme.desc: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now faces the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realise the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path. Horror sequel, directed by and starring John Krasinski, with Emily Blunt, Millicent Simmonds and Cillian Murphy

programme.title: Celebrity Come Dine with Me
programme.sub-title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine With Me
programme.desc: The final host, Charlie Wernham, throws an East End-themed night, on the set of Hollyoaks, and pushes the boat out with fresh seafood that has come all the way from Billingsgate Market in London

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The 31st Halloween special sees Barts toys take up arms against him, while Lisa and Nelson are stuck in a terrifying death loop

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Burns disguises himself as an employee at the power plant, but while the change is good news for Homer and his co-workers, Mr Smithers is not so keen

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Revenge Is a Dish Best Served Three Times
programme.desc: Three stories of vengeance, featuring Homer being accused of treason in post-revolutionary France, Milhouse leading a rebellion of misfits in modern-day Springfield and a new crimefighter by the name of Red Revenge takes to the streets of Springfield

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart and his family enter the twilight zone in three more cartoon tales of horror, including the discovery of Barts demented twin in the attic and Lisa being the god to an alternative human species cultured in a margarine tub. Plus, Homer tries to expose two fraudulent presidential candidates

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: Danni and Chase cant find common ground regarding their future plans. Chef Cloyce warily walks a tightrope through the guests numerous dietary requirements

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Manny, Phil and Gloria team up to find Luke when he goes missing, while Haley gets more than she bargained for when she interrupts her sister Alexs college class

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: The Johnsons decide to help Calvin and Tina have the wedding they missed out on the first time. Starring Cedric the Entertainer and Max Greenfield

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Calvin and Dave team up for a chance at bowling championship glory. Gemma and Tina face off. Starring Cedric the Entertainer and Max Greenfield

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Gemma sets a reluctant Malcolm up on a blind date with a teacher at her school. Starring Cedric the Entertainer and Max Greenfield

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.sub-title: The Hunt for the Great Albino Pumpkin
programme.desc: Adam finds himself disenchanted with Halloween, while Barry decides to bring his old rapper alter ego Big Tasty back to life. Barry and Joanne meet Elvira, Mistress of the Dark

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly encourages Principal Ball to establish a non-athlete senior night, while Ericas friends are not interested in being pre-wedding fun captain so she asks Geoffs sister

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly learns Linda Schwartz is hosting Thanksgiving and is concerned that her role is being threatened, while Pop-Pop surprises the family by showing up with a new lady friend

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam learns that he has been accepted into NYU, but his excitement is soon diminished when he realises Brea has been accepted into a school far away and fears the distance will affect their relationship

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.sub-title: You Only Die Once, or Twice, but Never Three Times
programme.desc: Beverly creates a plan to save Formica Mikes marriage, and Barry enlists Adam and his friends to create a James Bond-themed home movie in his ongoing efforts to court Joanne

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Sam Prince is seeing Beks in a whole new light, and the pair get cosy in the Cotswolds on a group getaway to Ollys family estate. Sam Vanderpump and Alice are looking forward to parenthood, but their joy is rocked by life-changing news for the soon-to-be father. Jack is still down about breaking up with Livvy, so his friends decide that enough is enough and try find a way to put a smile on his face

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to Charlies Italian bistro in La Verne, southern California, where the owners lack of business nous is putting her relatives homes at risk, after her mother and sister put them up as collateral. To make matters worse, the restaurants food is less than appetising and its long-serving chef seems to be incompetent

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Baltimore, Maryland, where Denise Whiting has alienated customers by trademarking the word hon, a term of endearment used by the local community. When she opened Cafe Hon in 1992 it was a roaring success, but as a result of Denises unwavering business ambition, people started to boycott the restaurant, leaving her frustrated by falling sales

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes concerned that his comfortable lifestyle is having an impact on his professional progress and is stopping him from achieving scientific greatness, so he asks the gang to make life more difficult for him. Meanwhile, Howard invents an unflattering game about Raj. Starring Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon are forced to defend themselves against criticism from an online bully after publishing a physics paper. Meanwhile, the girls confront embarrassing moments from their pasts during a night in. Comedy, guest starring Stephen Hawking, with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard receives shocking news as everyone prepares for the re-opening of the comic-book store. Penny tries to teach Sheldon how to let it go, but she is unable to follow her own advice when she learns something infuriating about Amy. Comedy, guest starring Nathan Fillion, with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic, a blue hedgehog who can run at supersonic speeds, is transported to Earth. A decade later, while enjoying life in Montana, his speedy skills create an electromagnetic pulse. Scientific genius Dr Robotnik is hired to investigate, and becomes obsessed with capturing the creature for his power. Live-action fantasy adventure based on the video games, starring James Marsden and Jim Carrey, with the voice of Ben Schwartz

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great New Years Bake Off 2022
programme.desc: Noel Fielding, Matt Lucas, Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood invite four former contestants to return to the tent in the hope of being crowned the first Star Baker of 2023. The hopefuls are 2021 finalist Chigs, 2020s Lottie and Manon and Antony from 2018. To help see in the new year, the bakers, family and friends are entertained by the cast of Riverdance

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny agree to participate in an unusual experiment, and Leonard, Amy, Raj and Emily spend the evening trying to escape from a zombie. Elsewhere, Howard and Bernadette run into trouble at the airport after returning from Mrs Wolowitzs funeral. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Trouble arises when Amy learns that Sheldon has applied for a one-way mission to colonise Mars. Meanwhile, Leonard surprises Penny with a gift, and Raj decides to snoop around Emilys flat after she is called back to work during their evening together. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is upset when a magazine fails to mention him in an article about the paper he co-wrote with Sheldon. Meanwhile, a power cut at Mrs Wolowitzs home leads to a final family dinner in her honour. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at UC Berkeley, they decide to take a detour and try to meet one of their idols - Star Wars director George Lucas. Meanwhile, Raj and Amy offer to settle a dispute with a game of table tennis. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard finds out that he has a half-brother, Sheldon and Amy have a platonic sleepover, and Penny gets an offer to audition for a Kevin Smith film. American comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart is awarded a driving licence for saving Springfield from a fire, and finds himself tied down when he develops a serious relationship with a teenage girl in a nearby town. Meanwhile, Lisa lands herself in trouble by falsely claiming Native American heritage. With the voice of Natalie Portman

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A documentary film-maker visits Springfield to see how the towns residents are progressing, making Homer worry he will not be seen as a success. In an attempt to convince the director of his so-called achievements, he borrows Mr Burns summer mansion, but his cunning plan does not have the desired effect. With the voice of Eric Idle

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart is referred to a therapist who is affected so deeply by the experience that she too is soon in need of treatment. Lisa gets a job tutoring Cletuss hillbilly children - and accidentally turns them into famous singers managed by Krusty and composer Stephen Sondheim. With the guest voices of Sondheim, Meg Ryan and Peter Bogdanovich

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer accidentally declares himself bankrupt, while Bart and Lisa con a delivery man into giving them a large amount of cardboard boxes. Grampa leaves the Springfield Retirement Castle and ends up falling in love with Selma

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer becomes a member of the paparazzi, and proves so successful at snapping embarrassing photographs that his celebrity victims seek revenge on him for exposing their indiscretions

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Famous faces including Nick Grimshaw, Rylan, Roman Kemp, Clare Balding, Gyles Brandreth, Carol Vorderman, Emma and Matt Willis, Andi Oliver, Oti Mabuse, Bill Bailey, Rob Beckett, Tom Allen, Fearne Cotton and Gok Wan review shows from July 2022, including Stranger Things, Love Island, Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico, How to Build a Sex Room, Long Lost Family, Countdown and BBC News coverage of Boris Johnsons resignation as PM

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including The Great Celebrity Bake Off for SU2C, Hunted, One Day, Anton and Giovannis Adventures in Spain, Married at First Sight Australia, Chicken Nugget, This Morning and BBC News

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including The Apprentice, Hunted, Coronation Street, The Underdog: Josh Must Win, Anton and Giovannis Adventures in Spain and Bridge of Lies. Plus, they reflect on news coverage of the Princess of Wales cancer diagnosis

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Annie, 37, has not had a relationship in a long time and is a bag of nerves as she waits to have dinner with builder Barry, who is three years her senior. However, she is also is struggling with a bigger issue and worries its a deal-breaker. Kevin, 67, is in the drainage business and brings his unique blend of diamond in the rough and Essex boy charm to his date with receptionist Meguel

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Savile Row tailor Riki has returned to the dating game after losing a lot of weight, but still struggles to see why women would find him attractive. Visual merchandiser Queenie admires Rikis penchant for a natty hat, but when he cant stop referring to himself as the beast, he risks losing her. Will and Des initially seem like a match made in heaven, but their date soon becomes one of the biggest car-crash encounters the restaurant has ever seen

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is asked to create a message on the off-chance a Nasa mission discovers alien life, and the guys fight over what he should do. Penny contemplates a return to acting. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Kunal Nayyar

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard questions his engineering abilities when he and Sheldon cant get a toy drone to fly. A cancelled flight almost stops Leonard from giving the commencement address at his former high school, while Raj pits his parents against each other when his father cuts him off financially

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsays next stop is Philadelphia, where family run restaurant Chiarellas is struggling to survive in an area full of thriving Italian eateries. Tommy and Dina Definos marriage is on the verge of collapse and his sense of personal failure only adds to the troubles of their crisis-ridden business

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Incredible Journeys with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon looks back on some of the most incredible wildlife stories he has discovered on his travels, from a giant tortoise sanctuary in the Seychelles to armed conservationists defending a forest in Belize. Catching up with old friends, Simon discovers how one of his programmes help protect a crucial whale sanctuary off the coast of Australia

programme.title: Incredible Journeys with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: A look at the challenge of preserving unspoilt wildernesses, from the icy expanses of Siberia to the tropical forests of central and South America. Simon reflects on how his past series have dealt with the causes and impact of climate change, as well as remembering a memorable report exposing the extent of plastic pollution in the ocean. He also recalls meeting indigenous people around the world and hearing their first-hand experiences of ecological damage

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: The discovery of a wreck off the coast of Florida sends a team of underwater explorers on a mission to discover the identity of a ship that simply shouldnt exist

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: In 1925 the SS Cotopaxi carrying coal and 32 men vanished. It has since become synonymous with one of the oceans greatest mysteries - the Bermuda Triangle
